inference:
The amplitude of the graph is the distance from the center line to the highest or lowest point on the graph. In this case, the amplitude is $3$, so $a = \boxed{3}$.
Final Answer: $\boxed{3}$. I hope it is correct.
ground_truth: The maximum value of $a \cos bx$ is $a,$ so $a = \boxed{3}.$
